title: I just removed LOL and cant reinstall
body: Everytime I install and try to launch it gives me error (could not connect to http server. Please check network connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.) could someone please help me.

replies.body: It looks like there might have been something going on in the past couple of days which made it where a good number of players weren't able to login. We haven't noticed server issues, since the majority of players have still been able to login normally, so it seems like this issue has something to do with certain files on your pc. Check out [**this sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline), and let me know if those steps worked or not.
